H0.text: Which famous London railway station is located on a bridge over the River Thames. Waterloo

H1.text: Which famous London railway station is located on a bridge over the River Thames. London Bridge

H2.text: Which famous London railway station is located on a bridge over the River Thames. Charing Cross

H3.text: Which famous London railway station is located on a bridge over the River Thames. Blackfriars

A4.text: Its platforms span the River Thames, the only station in London to do so, along the length of Blackfriars Railway Bridge, a short distance downstream from Blackfriars Bridge.

A5.text: Blackfriars station serves Thameslink rail services that connect suburbs with central London. It straddles the River Thames, running across the length of Blackfriars Railway Bridge parallel to the A201 Blackfriars Bridge.
